attributes.action: Make popular bus routes in central London and London suburbs have a 24/7 service
attributes.additional_details: I personally often go out late and live in an area near an overground station, overground trains do not offer an all night service resulting in me being worried for my personal safety walking from the station to my house. Especially being a young woman out late at night. A direct bus route e.g h12 would allow me to get the metro line from London into pinner and then jumping onto an h12 to hatch end, without worrying about the time or if I've missed the last bus home.
attributes.background:
Many people travel around London and the
Outskirts during the night time,there is often no direct Or nearby train station to a specific location, many people especially teens, may not be able to afford late night trains either. 24/7 busses will make people safer at night and allow a quicker journey

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. TfL is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
